messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: we have sent a ninja to your station to protect your station from syndicate harm... do not kill the ninja they are very expensive to buy from the spider clan....

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: we have opened a non lethal syndicate shop near the bottom of arrivals please come and buy to support nanotransen financially!

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: the syndicate shop will shut down in about 8 minutes buy while you still can!

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: The shop has now closed. centcomm still accepts donations of syndicate weaponry and money to continue our save the lavaland wildlife campaign!

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Delamination Update. Crystal Integrity is ~75%, we are officially on an "Engine Warning" Non essential crew are advised to stay clear of the engine area

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Attention Crew; Crystal Delamination is now at a Serious Warning level. ~50%

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Evacuation Status is confirmed. Engine Integrity is at ~31% and failing. Engineering wing and Stern sections of the ship are off limits to all non-engineering crew. The teleporter will be opened to an emergency location shortly.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: The Teleporter is going to a Days Inn in the Anro region, nearby. Hop aboad for safety.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Please get on the Evacuation shuttle or go to the space hotel. Delamination Imminent.
